channel.title: [MISC] Escape Room Redux (6/7) Chat currently decommissioned
channel.description:
The Escape Room I hosted a while ago was received well. I figured that, with the new skills I have when it comes to role playing, I would redux that and make it better. The traps and rooms are new - harder to complete in some cases. While all players have the objective to escape they may have some subgoals to complete. No abilities — Some were too powerful or too weak. All players will have to use things the old way — regular tools and weapons, not magic. [look here to see the original Escape Room](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-8-9-majority-escape/75586). This is going to be a good one. #### The original Escape Room was my very first MISC. 1) H_Hja 2) James - Arbiter 3) DirectorHail 4) Boss110 - Arbiter 5) Simon - Arbiter 6) FreyaPlays 7) ~~Sulit~~ [Eaten Alive by Spiders](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-chat-currently-decommissioned/77608/1083?u=magnus)
## The Story **Phase 1** [Jailed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-dark-room/77608/30?u=magnus) - Chapter One. [Dark Room](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-dark-room/77608/206?u=magnus) - Chapter Two. [Fiery Room](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-fiery-room/77608/343?u=magnus) - Chapter Three. [Return to the Dark Room](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-return-to-the-dark-room/77608/452?u=magnus) - Chapter Four. [Mannequin Murder Room](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-return-to-the-dark-room/77608/494?u=magnus) - Chapter Five. **Phase 2** [Apothecary](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-mannequin-murder-room/77608/836?u=magnus) - Chapter One. [**Tempoarily Decommissioned**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-room-redux-7-7-chat-currently-decommissioned/77608/1082?u=magnus) - Group Splintered

item.title: [MISC] Escape Room Redux (6/7) Chat currently decommissioned
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Well, if you fail you Subgoal but escape, you technically escape, but it you complete your Subgoal you’ll get an advantage next MMU game you play. Simon got a controlling ability a lot, as an example.
Most is classified.

Read full topic

Otherwise if another person did, there goes my subgoal…
